TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void XmlElementEventHandler(object sender, XmlElementEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed XmlElementEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub XmlElementEventHandler(sender As Object, e As XmlElementEventArgs)
public delegate void XmlElementEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, XmlElementEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示處理 的 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles the event of an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您建立委派，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create an delegate, you identify the method that handles the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115). 發生事件，只有當您呼叫方法。The event occurs only when you call the method. ## Examples 下列範例會還原序列化的類別，名為`Group`從名為 UnknownElements.xml 檔案。The following example deserializes a class named `Group` from a file named UnknownElements.xml. 每當在類別中，沒有對應成員的檔案中找到的項目是就會發生事件。Whenever an element is found in the file that has no corresponding member in the class, the event occurs. 若要執行範例，將下列 XML 程式碼貼入名為 UnknownElements.xml 的檔案。To try the example, paste the following XML code into a file named UnknownElements.xml. ``` MyGroup Large 444 West ``` [!code-cpp[XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example/CPP/unknownelement.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example/CS/unknownelement.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example/VB/unknownelement.vb#1)]
